entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
